text: Huge problem in our industry and sadly very few folks talking about it. Glad to see it gets its own week <http://geekmentalhelp.com/>

When I went to Creative Director camp, one of the most attended sessions was about burnout. Really interesting to hear the shared stories of one's background and how it applies to anything a person is asked to do for work.

attachments.title: Fabulous: Motivate Me! - Android Apps on Google Play
attachments.text: Reset your habits, Rewire your Brain & Transform your Life, all in 24 days!
